body_html: Thanks @pjh5. The issue is resolved. The segmentations in json file are in RLE format for iscrowd=0. but for maskrcnn, it should be in polygons format. I stored my dataset in polygon format. Now iam able to train maskrcnn on my dataset.
body_text: Thanks @pjh5. The issue is resolved. The segmentations in json file are in RLE format for iscrowd=0. but for maskrcnn, it should be in polygons format. I stored my dataset in polygon format. Now iam able to train maskrcnn on my dataset.
body: Thanks @pjh5. The issue is resolved. The segmentations in json file are in RLE format for iscrowd=0. but for maskrcnn, it should be in polygons format. I stored my dataset in polygon format. Now iam able to train maskrcnn on my dataset.
